comment: Professor was not really present for most of the course. Communication was done primarily by a student assistant. The class itself was extremely easy and not many assignments. The main bad thing was the lack of on-time grading. Most grades did not come through until the end of the semester.

I took this class online. It really is an easy class, but it is also fun. Tests, Finals, and Quizzes, and all are open-book, so they are easy enough. The individual project at the end takes a lot of time, so avoid procrastinating on it!
